nodes.text: if growth remains below par - by which I mean below 6.0 per cent - and inflation moves upwards Singh will see all this praise melt away

If nothing angers the middle class more than inflation and their anger would cause Singh's praise to melt away then - if growth remains below par and inflation moves upwards Singh will lose his support.
Nothing angers the middle class more than inflation and that is a threat a Singh tenure at the fisc certainly faces.
If the middle class are angry at Singh he will see his praise melt away
